part.content: CHAPTER II : REGISTRATION OF DESIGNS. Sec. 3 - 10.
CHAPTER III : COPYRIGHT IN REGISTERED DESIGNS. Sec. 11 - 20.
CHAPTER IV : INDUSTRIAL AND INTERNATIONAL EXHIBITIONS. Sec. 21.
CHAPTER VII : POWERS AND DUTIES OF CONTROLLER. Sec. 32 - 36.
CHAPTER X : POWERS, ETC., OF CENTRAL GOVERNMENT. Sec. 44 - 47.
CHAPTER XI : REPEAL AND SAVING . Sec. 48.
